Description.Name: Sample hardware abstraction for Seeed MT3620 MDB
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This file defines the mapping from the Seeed MT3620 Mini Development Board (MDB) to the
// 'sample hardware' abstraction used by the samples at https://github.com/Azure/azure-sphere-samples.
// Some peripherals are on-board on the Seeed MT3620 MDB, while other peripherals must be attached externally if needed.
// See https://aka.ms/AzureSphereHardwareDefinitions for more information on how to use hardware abstractions,
// to enable apps to work across multiple hardware variants.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_BUTTON_1
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external button using J1, pin 9.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_BUTTON_2
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external button using J2, pin 15.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CHANNEL
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Channel 3 for the PWM LED1 green. In the app manifest, it is only necessary to request the capability for the PWM Controller, SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CONTROLLER.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CHANNEL
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external potentiometer to ADC controller 0, channel 0 using pin 1. In the app manifest, it is only necessary to request the capability for the ADC Group Controller, SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CONTROLLER.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_RED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external LED using J1, pin 1.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_GREEN
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external LED using J1, pin 2.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_BLUE
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external LED using J1, pin 3.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_UART_LOOPBACK
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect J1 pin 7 (RX) to J1 pin 5 (TX).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external LSM6DS3 to I2C using J1 and J2, pin 15 (SDA) and pin 10 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external LSM6DS3 to SPI using J1, pin 7 (MISO), pin 5 (SCLK), pin 8 (CSA), pin 6 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI_CS
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SPI Chip Select (CS) value "A". This is not a peripheral identifier, and so has no meaning in an app manifest.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_RESET
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external reset signal using J1, pin 1.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_DFU
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external dfu signal using J2, pin 13.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external NRF52 UART using J1, pin 7 (RX), pin 5 (TX), pin 8 (CTS), pin 6 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_PENDING_UPDATE_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 MDB: Connect external blue LED using J1, pin 5.
